transcript:
Customer: Hanuman gyan gun sagar jai kapis tilok ujagar.
Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Ha bolo.
Executive: Suresh bhai kaise hain aap?
Customer: Bas badhiya bolo.
Executive: Main Suresh baat kar raha tha se bata na.
Customer: Kya?
Executive: Suresh baat kar raha hu India Mart se.
Customer: Ha kaun baat kar rahe ho?
Executive: Suresh Suresh.
Customer: Ha boliye Suresh ji.
Executive: Kaise hain sir aap?
Customer: Ye aapko maine call aage karwai thi vansh ke tumar ke naam se.
Executive: Hai na?
Customer: Pata nahi aap se baat hui hai ye vansh tumar ki baat hui hogi sir aapke secondary number pe India mart pe jo hai.
Executive: Ha ha.
Executive: Kaun hai uske number pe kaun hai?
Customer: Secondary number pe kaun tha?
Executive: Ha matlab uske number pe kuch nahi hai matlab kaun hai aapki team mein?
Customer: Deven Mehta karte hai uske sath baat karna hai maine aapke sir ko kaha tha.
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Customer: To head office se mere ko call aaya tha.
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Customer: Maine usko kaha tha ki Deven Mehta se ke baat kar lijiye.
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Customer: Wo bole visibility visibility aisa kuch kehna chahte the wo sab kuch maine bola ye sir ke sath baat kar lo wo hamari hai main to employee hu.
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Customer: To fir wo maine Deven sir ko call kiya tha usne bola aisa koi call aaya nahi hai aur koi call kare to kehna ki 10:30 ke teen 3 baje ke beech mein kare.
Executive: Hmm hmm hmm.
Customer: Number dusra koi show ho raha hai system mein ki nahi ho raha hai.
Executive: Number to dusra show nahi ho raha hai ek number jo show ho raha hai mujhe ek to jaise meri baat ho rahi hai aapka number hai ye to mujhe pata hai.
Executive: Ek yahan pe aur jo ek number hai main bata raha hu 878 aap se hi to baat hui hai shayad se.
Customer: 87 fir 8.
Executive: 845 aap se hi to baat hui hogi vansh ki.
Customer: Ha wo to mere sath hi baat hua main to aisa keh raha hu maine bola ki dusra number hai usme baat kariye.
Executive: To matlab baat mein kya hua kuch positive nahi nikla kya unhone aapne na us pe not satisfied mark kiya hai call pe.
Customer: Ha main main nahi satisfied hua isliye maine not satisfied kiya mera problem hi solve nahi kar rahe to kya problem bataiye sir kya problem thi maine aapko bola na to pehle to kaha tha yaar fir kya bar bar ek hi baat karne wo to uska uska to maine aapko solution bataya tha aapke liye hazar bhi ka hazar ka bhi waha se humko business nahi mil raha hai to fir aap socho.
Executive: Dusra dekho matter mein requirement acha rehta hai aur usme mere ko jyada munafa hota hai bilkul bilkul bilkul bilkul aap socho sir aapka brand abhi market mein naya hai theek hai aisa nahi ki bahut acha sir naya hai to aapko pehle sab wo kehna chahiye ki naya hai to isme aage nahi badh sakte nahi badh sakte sir badh bhi rahe hain.
Executive: Badh bhi rahe hain even do aap dekho aapko initially inquiry nahi aati thi aapke brand ki lekin ab inquiry aa rahi hai nahi nahi nahi aa rahi bhai nahi aa rahi wo bhi aadmi ek call aaya tha wo bhi dusre brand ka hair oil mang raha 12 12 november se mere ko ek bhi call nahi aaya ki bhai mere ko tumhari brand chaiye.
Customer: Dekho sir abhi tak ek call nahi aaya.
Executive: Screenshot dalu aapko?
Customer: Dalo whatsapp pe dalo ruko sir dal de raha hu.
Customer: Ha chalo main bhi aapko na ruko hi bheja aapko.
Executive: Net chal raha hai aapka?
Customer: Dal diya whatsapp mein aap check karo sir.
Executive: Nahi aaya abhi isliye aapka net hi band hai mujhe lag raha hai.
Customer: Ye to chal hi raha hai.
Executive: [inaudible]
summary:
Concerns:

- Not getting enough business from IndiaMART.

- No inquiries for his brand since November 12.

- Previous issue not resolved.



Resolution:

- Executive offered to send a screenshot.

- Asked to share the screenshot on WhatsApp.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, inquiries, not satisfied, brand
